translation.en: What would you do if, for the last seven months,
translation.ja: 想像してみて ７ヵ月間 壁に囲まれて生活してきた

translation.en: your life had been made of walls?
translation.ja: ７ヵ月間 壁に囲まれて生活してきた

translation.en: Every morsel you eat had been monitored
translation.ja: 食事をひと口単位で監視され

translation.en: and every pound of weight you put on, charted.
translation.ja: 増えた体重を記録された

translation.en: And now, all you have to do to get out
translation.ja: そして ここを 抜け出す方法は１つ

translation.en: is not be crazy for the next five minutes.
Could you do that?
Tick- tock.
Tick.
Tock.
Mia?
Mia.
Dr. Nell asked if you were listening.
I am.
I have been, yeah.
Wonderful. Uh, well, we've been through your discharge papers.
translation.ja: よかった 退院手続きは完了だ

translation.en: That's sorted.
And Dr. Olsen has briefed you on your medication?
translation.ja: オルセン先生から 薬の説明は？

translation.en: - She did. Yes. Very thorough. - That's what we like.
translation.ja: 丁寧に受けました よかった

translation.en: I've sent the prescriptions through to the pharmacy, so Dad, if you want to pick it up,
translation.ja: 処方箋を送ったから お父さんが薬の受け取りを

translation.en: and Mia, why don't you head up to the dormitory and gather your things?
translation.ja: ミアは寮に行き 荷物をまとめて

translation.en: Meems, you good?
Yeah. Almost done.
Now, in terms of your daily schedule and routine, we've spoken to your school
translation.ja: 君の日課や決まりについては 学校に話してあるよ

translation.en: and teachers and lunch staff will be on hand to help during the day.
translation.ja: 先生やランチスタッフが 日中は協力してくれる

translation.en: And, at home, as far as the meal plan goes, same routine as here.
translation.ja: 家での食事については 施設と同じだよ

translation.en: And, Mia, a big part of this has to come from you.
translation.ja: ミア 一番大事なのは 君の努力だ

translation.en: Knowing your own body, respecting the recovery plan.
translation.ja: 自分の体を知り 治療計画に従って

translation.en: We're still in an adjustment period.
Get ready to lie…
So you will take it easy to begin with?
Now.
Yeah.
Nice.
Good. Then you can shoot off.
Home.
♪ I spend a long time ♪ ♪ Thinking about the things I should change ♪ ♪ Trying to make way for a new day ♪
They say you never remember the smell of home until you've spent some time away.
translation.ja: しばらく離れなきゃ 家のにおいは分からない

translation.en: Well, turns out home is bigger than I thought.
translation.ja: 思ったより 家の存在は大きかった

translation.en: This car is home.
London is home.
Home is here.
Home is my dad.
How are you feeling?
Fine.
Back there you had a team of specialists to cater to everything.
translation.ja: 施設では専門家がいたが もうパパしかいない

translation.en: - Out here you've just got little old me. - And little old Prozac.
translation.ja: 施設では専門家がいたが もうパパしかいない フルオキセチンも

translation.en: There is always little old Prozac.
And teachers, and friends.
And Mum.
She did really want to be there today.
How's Alex?
Fine. Yeah, fine.
He's really looking forward to having you home.
translation.ja: お前の帰りを待ってる

translation.en: Yeah. Well, for now I just want to lie down in my own bed and be by my lonesome.
translation.ja: とりあえず自分のベッドで １人で横になりたい

translation.en: Yeah.
Yep, yep, yep. You would want that, wouldn't you?
translation.ja: そりゃ１人になりたいよな

translation.en: - Just a few family… - Dad. …and neighbors, and Mrs. McGinty.
translation.ja: 家族と隣人と マッギンティさんだけ

translation.en: Dad!
Oh, I thought that you might want to see everyone.
translation.ja: お前もみんなに 会いたいんじゃないかと…

translation.en: - Oh, Jesus fuck, Rick! - We've all really missed you.
translation.ja: サイアク みんな会いたいんだ

translation.en: So, I'm being thrown a party for having flown the cuckoo's nest?
translation.ja: 精神科病院を出ただけで パーティー？

translation.en: - It's fine, fine, fine. - What're you doing?
- I am calling them, telling them to leave. - Wait. No. Fuck. Don't do that.
translation.ja: みんなに帰ってもらう やめて

translation.en: - But you just said-- - It's fine.
- You sure? - Mm- hmm.
I'm an idiot!
Please try and act surprised.
Surprise!
Surprise!
Oh my God, you guys, you shouldn't have!
translation.ja: みんな ビックリするじゃん

translation.en: Fucking nailed that.
- Aw… - Gran.
We couldn't resist, cherub.
- It's lovely to see you too. - Oh, you look so wonderful.
translation.ja: 会いたかった 元気そうでよかった

translation.en: So healthy.
Ugh. That word.
Thanks.
Heya.
Jesus, hi.
I tried to talk them out of it, believe me.
Where's my girl?
Oh my God.
Hey, Mum.
Awkward hug incoming.
Darling, sweetheart. I'm so sorry I'm late.
The airport was absolutely horrendous…
Or no hug. Yep, that's definitely worse.
translation.ja: ハグすらなしなんて最悪

translation.en: Was everything alright with Dr. Nell?
All fine. Better than fine.
Oh, you are a star.
I'm so sorry I couldn't be more help.
translation.ja: もっと力になりたかった

translation.en: More?
You're here now.
Mia?
A slice for the girl of the hour.
translation.ja: 今日の主役にひと切れ

translation.en: You've got to be fucking kidding me.
I made coconut sponge. Your favorite.
translation.ja: ココナツケーキは 好きでしょ？

translation.en: - I'll just be a minute. - Sweetheart, you--
translation.ja: 失礼する おい ミア

translation.en: Overall, could have gone better.
Okay, Mia, name five things you can see.
translation.ja: 見える物を５つ挙げてみて

translation.en: Loo roll.
Toilet brush.
Hand cream.
Soap.
Mirror.
Get your shit together, Mia. It's just cake.
You can't go back there.
She's not having bloody cake.
But she looks so healthy.
She has an issue with food.
Healthy.
They wouldn't have let her out if she wasn't better.
translation.ja: 治ったから退院したんでしょ

translation.en: - You don't know… - She is okay.
Um… It does look delicious,
translation.ja: 何も知らないくせに おいしそうだけど 今回は遠慮しとく

translation.en: but I think I might take a rain check. Uh…
translation.ja: おいしそうだけど 今回は遠慮しとく

translation.en: The medication. I just feel a bit off.
translation.ja: 薬のせいで少し気分が悪い

translation.en: Of course, darling.
Thank you, Gran.
Why not go and have a lie down?
Relax for a bit.
- Yeah. - Yeah.
If you drop a glass and it breaks, you can always glue it back together.
translation.ja: ガラスが割れても 接着剤で直せる

translation.en: But if you drop it again and again and again,
translation.ja: でも何度も落とせば いつか―

translation.en: eventually, it's going to be more glue than glass.
translation.ja: ガラスより接着剤の方が 多くなる

translation.en: I wonder which I am now?
I used to write these lists every day.
translation.ja: 〝減量 カロリー〞 毎日 記録してた

translation.en: Everything I ate down to the mouthful.
translation.ja: 食べた物をひと口単位で

translation.en: I thought they were helping me, drowning out the bad thoughts.
translation.ja: 〝トースト１枚 １３０ ジャム３杯 １５０〞 悪い思考をかき消すためにね

translation.en: I didn't realize they were drowning out the good as well.
translation.ja: でも いい思考も 消してしまってた

translation.en: All the everyday beauty I forgot how to see.
translation.ja: 忘れてしまった 日々の美しさを―

translation.en: And all the things I get to rediscover now.
translation.ja: 今 また見つけ出さなきゃ

translation.en: There she is. How are you feeling, princess?
translation.ja: おはよう　気分はどう？

translation.en: Good. Excited.
That's the spirit.
Morning, all.
Good morning.
There's some breakfast for you here.
Oh, got to dash. Meeting a new client.
I'm trying to convince them lavender is the new teal.
translation.ja: ラベンダー色を勧めてる

translation.en: Smoothie, anyone?
translation.ja: スムージーは？ 家族で食事をとるのが大事だ

translation.en: Remember what Dr. Nell said? Family meals?
translation.ja: 家族で食事をとるのが大事だ

translation.en: Yes, but I haven't got time today.
Well, can you make time?
Glad to see nothing's changed here.
Sorry, did you say something?
Might be nice for you to eat with us.
translation.ja: 一緒に食べたい 私が働かなきゃ 食べていけない

translation.en: Food doesn't get on the table if I don't work, I'm afraid.
translation.ja: 私が働かなきゃ 食べていけない

translation.en: Now, before you go…
Oh great, a little chat.
We thought it might be best to have a little chat with you.
translation.ja: 少しおしゃべりしようか

translation.en: Darling, chat?
Yeah, yes. Um…
Mia. You know how much today is worth?
translation.ja: ミア 今日が どれだけ大事か分かる？

translation.en: Flying solo for the first time in six months…
Seven months.
We're giving you this chance to show us that you're ready.
translation.ja: もう大丈夫だって証明して

translation.en: We just want you to stay here and be happy with us.
translation.ja: この家で幸せを感じてほしい

translation.en: And we want you to be honest this time.
I know.
So, just for emergencies…
translation.ja: 緊急時のために渡しておくよ

translation.en: Oh, where's my phone?
Yeah, the advice says no social media.
Might as well have given me a cup and string.
translation.ja: こんなの糸電話も同然

translation.en: Right, now that's over with, to the office with me.
translation.ja: じゃあ私はオフィスに行くわ

translation.en: Cinnamon.
Thanks for holding the fort.
Bloody mental baskets, aren't they?
You're a bit Disney this morning.
Oh, look at me, just walking in the sun.
translation.ja: 私は太陽の下を歩いてる

translation.en: No one to tell me where to go, what to do.
translation.ja: 誰にも何も指示されない

translation.en: This is living, my brother.
This is…
Oh shit.
I'll be nearby, okay?
Cameron.
My first friend.
Best friend.
Or so I thought.
- Hey, skinny. -
Wow.
What?
No. I read somewhere that you're supposed to acknowledge it. No repression and that.
translation.ja: 現状を認めるのが大事だって どこかで読んだ

translation.en: You're looking taller.
Yeah, well, it's been a while.
No kidding.
I missed you, M.
Right.
- I'm sorry. - Since when did you start smoking?
translation.ja: ごめん いつからタバコを？

translation.en: Is that a veiled hint?
I like my lungs, they've always been on my side.
translation.ja: 私を裏切らない肺を 大事にしたい

translation.en: Look, M, can we…
Can we talk about it? About what happened.
translation.ja: 何があったか ちゃんと話そう

translation.en: Oh, would you look at this vision!
translation.ja: すごい　目を疑っちゃった

translation.en: Becca, quite possibly a Mensan.
translation.ja: メンサにも入れそうなほど 賢いベッカ

translation.en: And Will, my wife.
Doth mine eyes deceive me!
Called in the cavalry.
Any longer and I might have just weed myself.
- You literally visited me three days ago. - Oh, three miserable days.
translation.ja: ３日前に会った ３日間 心配してた

translation.en: These are the greatest people of all time.
- Too long. - Way too long.
translation.ja: 長かった 本当にね

translation.en: Never again?
No promises. Never promises.
translation.ja: 断言も約束もできない

translation.en: Never again. I'm all yours now.
translation.ja: もう平気　どこにも行かない

translation.en: Let's go fuck up some shit.
Mia, are you okay?
Yeah, yeah, I'm fine.
Uh, excuse me!
Hey, there you are. I thought you'd gone overboard.
translation.ja: 来たね 乗り損ねたかと思った

translation.en: - You're good, yeah? - Oh, fuck good.
translation.ja: 大丈夫？ 当然だよ 自由になったんだし

translation.en: She's better than good, she's free.
translation.ja: 当然だよ 自由になったんだし

translation.en: So much to see, so much to do. I mean, where do we even start?
translation.ja: 何から再開するか迷うよね

translation.en: I was thinking maybe the cinema? Or the skate park?
translation.ja: 映画館かスケートパークかな

translation.en: Oh…  We haven't gone there in forever.
translation.ja: スケートか　懐かしい

translation.en: Uh, the cinema though, we can go this Friday?
- Becs, this Friday we're supposed to be-- - Oh shit.
translation.ja: 今週の金曜は… マジかよ

translation.en: Is that…
Oh God, hide me.
- I told her that I moved to Cameroon. - Why? Who is she?
translation.ja: 引っ越したと言った 誰なの？

translation.en: The one that wanted to role- play as Mary, Queen of Scots or the one who wanted to stick a finger up--
translation.ja: 女王役をしたがった子か 指を入れた…

translation.en: Yes. Her.
So you had… sex with her?
translation.ja: あの子と セックスしたってこと？

translation.en: Who hasn't he had sex with? That's the real question.
translation.ja: あの子だけじゃないよ

translation.en: You can talk. At least I'm not going at it with my boss.
translation.ja: 俺はボスとは寝てない

translation.en: Seriously, you guys!
What? You said no salacious gossip till she was back.
translation.ja: ミアが戻るまで エロい話は禁止だった

translation.en: She's back!
Only just. She's still in recovery.
Ah! She is recovered. Look at her.
And the only thing she's starved of right now is gossip.
translation.ja: ミアもゴシップに飢えてる

translation.en: And I will be your waiter this evening.
And excuse me, me and my boss are not just at it.
translation.ja: 僕のは ただのセックスじゃないよ

translation.en: It was magical. In the store cupboard at work.
translation.ja: ボスと職場の戸棚でだ

translation.en: He kept giving me eyes over the cheese counter.
translation.ja: チーズ越しに誘われた

translation.en: I still get a tingle when I think about Manchego.
translation.ja: 今でもチーズに興奮する

translation.en: Well, I'm glad I still have one respectable friend.
translation.ja: 尊敬できる友達は １人残ってる

translation.en: Here's to our interminable virginity.
Ha- ha! She's a woman now!
What? No! You too?
- With who? - Just this guy at Reading.
translation.ja: 誰と？ レディングで会った人

translation.en: Why didn't you tell me?
Wasn't worth mentioning. It was no big deal.
translation.ja: 大したことじゃないし

translation.en: No big deal?
I'm pretty sure you compared it to…  …a religious experience.
translation.ja: 宗教的な体験と 比べてるのか？

translation.en: Oh, speaking of drunken mistakes, did you hear what Steph got up to at Nick's after we left?
translation.ja: 酒の過ちと言えば ステフに何があったと？

translation.en: - No. - No.
Fuck, how can I have missed so much in seven months?
translation.ja: ７ヵ月で こんなに置いてきぼりに？

translation.en: - Hey. Bro. - All right?
- Yo. Lads! - What's up?
It's like bloody Sesame Street in here.
translation.ja: 子供みたいなバカ騒ぎね

translation.en: Right?
Steph! Leanne! Sarah, you gorgeous thing!
translation.ja: ステフ リアン サラ ステキだね

translation.en: You'll get used to it.
Yo, Becs, what you sayin'?
You're mates with Jonah? But we hate Jonah.
translation.ja: いつの間にジョナと友達に？

translation.en: He has the good weed.
There are multiple weeds?
I am sorry…
that I didn't tell you about Reading. I thought with everything--
translation.ja: レディングのこと 黙ってたのは…

translation.en: It's fine.
I get it. You were protecting me.
The concept of virginity is some bullshit invention of the patriarchy anyway.
translation.ja: 処女の概念は 家父長制度のたわ言だし

translation.en: Yeah.
Come on. We're this way.
Oi. Out my chair.
Oh, of course, sorry.
Uh, move along, dickhead.
Hello!
Hello!
Welcome, everyone, on this very special morning.
translation.ja: 皆さん 今日は すごく特別な日ですよ

translation.en: Christ. Not you too, Miss Lambert.
As discussed in the last registration,
translation.ja: 前回の授業で話したとおり

translation.en: the lovely Mia Polanco is rejoining us.
translation.ja: ミア･ポランコさんが 戻ってきました

translation.en: So everyone, please be extra, especially welcoming.
translation.ja: 皆さんで温かく 迎えてあげてくださいね

translation.en: - Just like we talked about. - Perfect.
translation.ja: 頼むわよ 最高だね

translation.en: That's perfect.
In AA, one of the first things they tell you
translation.ja: 禁酒の会で最初に教わるのは

translation.en: is to avoid people, places, and things that trigger you.
translation.ja: 引き金となる 人や場所や物を避けること

translation.en: This doesn't exactly help when your trigger is something
translation.ja: 生きるために必要なことが 引き金だと

translation.en: you literally need in order to literally live.
translation.ja: 役に立たない助言だよね

translation.en: And it isn't just eating that's the problem. It's after.
translation.ja: しかも問題は 食べたあとも続く

translation.en: It's the aching, inside- out panic of feeling the food settle.
translation.ja: 食べ物が胃に落ちる感覚が 耐えられない

translation.en: Every day.
Trying always to find a better reason than because they tell me to.
translation.ja: “言われたから”っていう 以外の理由が欲しい

translation.en: Hi.
My name is Mia Polanco.
One moment.
There you go.
Of course they saddle me with the Dwayne Johnson of potatoes.
translation.ja: 巨大なジャガイモを 食べさせられる

translation.en: Nope, it's fine.
Just a simple enormous potato.
translation.ja: ただの巨大なジャガイモ

translation.en: So what are we going to serve?
- Tequila? - Going to be absolutely rattled.
translation.ja: テキーラ？ 完全に酔う

translation.en: - Absolutely. -
Hey.
What are you guys talking about?
I was just saying that Yorkie is the ultimate gay chocolate bar.
translation.ja: ヨーキーのチョコバーって 最強にゲイだよね

translation.en: - Mm- hmm. - Bollocks. What about Twix or Mounds Bar?
translation.ja: ツイックスとマウンズは？

translation.en: Twix is pan, Mounds Bars are lesbian. Keep up.
translation.ja: 全性愛者とレズビアン

translation.en: And what are Skittles?
- Ooh, Skittles. - Orgy.
Mia. I didn't know you'd be back today.
translation.ja: ミア 今日から復帰なのね

translation.en: Alison. Entirely her own adjective.
translation.ja: アリソン 唯一無二の存在

translation.en: Yeah, I figured it was time to--
Great. Great.
Hey, guys.
- Hi, Cameron. - Hi.
translation.ja: キャメロンも やあ

translation.en: So, wow.  It's been forever.
When's the last time I saw you? Like, Year 10?
I was here last year. It's been like seven months.
translation.ja: 去年も会った　７ヵ月前だよ

translation.en: Yeah. Ages.
So, how are you? How was it?
It was… It was fine. You know how it is.
Well, no. I don't. I've never been to a mental hospital.
translation.ja: いいえ 精神病院とは無縁だもん

translation.en: So, uh, A- levels are kicking my arse. - Alison, how are you finding them? -
translation.ja: アリソン Ａレベルの出来は？

translation.en: I totally bombed the first assessment in Bio
and I've never heard of any of the set texts for English.
translation.ja: 国語の読解も意味不明

translation.en: - One of them is Hamlet. - I know, right? It's crazy.
translation.ja: ハムレットね 誰それ？って感じ

translation.en: So, was your room all padded and stuff?
translation.ja: 病室の壁は柔らかかった？

translation.en: - Uh, no, that's not really-- - Don't get me wrong.
translation.ja: いいえ それは… 誤解しないで

translation.en: I totally get where you're coming from.
One summer, I literally lived off of nothing but Polo Mints.
translation.ja: 私もひと夏をミントで しのいだことがある

translation.en: - Oh, I'm so sorry, that sounds-- - No, don't be.
translation.ja: それは つらいね ううん 別に

translation.en: I looked great. I wore crop tops for like two months.
translation.ja: ２ヵ月間 クロップトップで過ごせた

translation.en: Are you going to Theo's party on Friday?
translation.ja: 金曜はセオのパーティーに？

translation.en: - Why are you all being weird? - He probably didn't know to invite you.
translation.ja: 何なの？ 君を知らないのかも

translation.en: - It probably won't be that good anyway. - Oh.
At his last party, Will was literally like,
I've peaked. Kill me now. Life will not get better than this.
translation.ja: “今が人生の絶頂だ”って ウィルが言ってた

translation.en: I thought I needed to get back to the person I was before,
translation.ja: 元の自分に戻ろうと 必死だったけど

translation.en: to the things I loved, but they all kept moving while I stood still.
translation.ja: 私が止まってる間に 何もかも変わってた

translation.en: Parties, drinking, drugs, sex. That's the new normal.
translation.ja: パーティー 酒 ドラッグ セックス これが当たり前

translation.en: That's what I need to catch up on, or else I'll be left behind.
translation.ja: 挽回しなきゃ取り残される

translation.en: I'm way more in the mood for the cinema anyway.
- Oh yeah. - Mm. Me too.
Or we could stay in, do Clueless again.
Like, if… if you guys want. I don't really care.
translation.ja: まあ 何でもいいけど

translation.en: A party is the perfect place to catch up.
translation.ja: 挽回するならパーティーだ

translation.en: All the birds, one stone.
Where are you going?
The other side.
This is a good idea. This is a good idea.
translation.ja: これは間違いなく名案でしょ

translation.en: - This is a good-- - Theo! Oh God. I'm so sorry.
translation.ja: これこそ… ごめんなさい

translation.en: - That's okay. - Sorry.
- No, that's okay. It's, um… - Hi.
translation.ja: 大丈夫だよ ハーイ

translation.en: Theo. The cutest of the cute.
translation.ja: セオ 最高にイケてる

translation.en: Mia! You're back. Oh, that's bloody ace.
translation.ja: ミア 戻ってきたんだね

translation.en: Can I come on Friday?
What?
To the party.
Is it, like, cool if I come?
Oh right.
Yeah, sure. If… you want to.
translation.ja: もちろん　来たければどうぞ

translation.en: Really?
I mean, great, perfect. Um…
translation.ja: それなら よかった

translation.en: Is there like an invitation I need to get in, or…
Uh, no, that's not really a thing.
Right. Of course.
So does that mean there won't be any party bags?
translation.ja: パーティーのお土産は ないんだよね？

translation.en: Damn, I knew there was something I forgot.
translation.ja: 用意するのを忘れてた

translation.en: Yeah, 'cause the ones at your fifth birthday were, like, next- level.
translation.ja: ５歳の誕生日会のは すごかった

translation.en: - Is that why you want the invite? - Only reason. For the Chupa Chups.
